h2.div: Bunker R-3 Sign Up for Meals

div.p: The school district will provide FREE meals to students during the school closure for those that sign up for this service. Meals will be available for pick-up or delivery (we will deliver in town and along our regular bus routes) between 10:00 am - 12:00 pm on Tuesday & Thursday of each week, beginning March 24th.
On Tuesdays, 2 breakfast and 2 lunch meals will be available and on Thursdays, 3 breakfast and 3 lunch meals will be available.
These meals will be available for FREE for anyone 18 and under regardless of what school they attend. No paperwork is required.
Children must be present in order for meals to be provided. There are two ways to sign up for this service:
1. Click on this link, forms.gle/q2DLdxMMCdwgGmnd8, fill out and submit the form, or
2. Contact the building secretary at school by Thursday, March 19th to register.

div.p: As per Section 177.091 RSMo. 1979, the Bunker R-III School Board of Education hereby advertises for sale of, surplus property. For a complete listing of items see the district website at www.bunkerr3.k12.mo.us or a listing may be picked up at the Administrative Office, Hwy 72 and Eagle Pride Drive, Bunker, Missouri. Persons wishing to inspect the property may call the Bunker R-III School Administrative Office at 573/689-2211 ext. 3 and arrange an appointment. The property will be sold as is by sealed bid. All persons wishing to bid must present their sealed bid to the attention of
Melissa Nash, Superintendent, Hwy 72 and Eagle Pride Drive, Bunker, Missouri, 63629 by 10:00 a.m. Thursday, March 19, 2020.

Please write on the sealed bid “Surplus Sale Bid”. Bids will be opened March 19 at the Bunker R-III Regular Board Meeting. Those awarded the bids will be notified on March 23, 2020. The Board of Education reserves the right to accept or reject any and all bids.
